title: Let's talk about something happy for once. k?
body:
Soo, as the name suggests, can we pls talk about something happy? No "THE INTERNET IS DYING" or complaints about champions being broken.
Ok? ok.

I'll start off the conversation by talking about a game; "A Hat in Time". for those who've played it, you'll know what i mean when i say it's an adorable lil 3d-platformer, similar to super mario galaxy, but new and shiny and fun.
